Package controller

Interface RecordingEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface RecordingEvent
Interface tasked with actions regarding the recording of songs and muting the song the user is trying to play on the piano

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void muteSong()
    Mute the octave INIT_OCTAVE to (INIT_OCTAVE + NUM_OCTAVES)
    void saveRecordedSong​(java.lang.String name, boolean isPublic)
    Notifies the controller that the recorded song must be saved
    void startRecording​(boolean recording)
    Notifies the controller that the user started recording
    void unmuteSong()
    Unmute the octave INIT_OCTAVE to (INIT_OCTAVE + NUM_OCTAVES)
    void validateRecording()
    Tells the Controller the user has stopped recording the piano song, if the song is valid the Controller should notify the view thorough 'requestSongInformation()'.

  • Method Details

    • startRecording

      void startRecording​(boolean recording)
      Notifies the controller that the user started recording
      Parameters:
      recording - True if the user started recording, false if the user stopped

    • saveRecordedSong

      void saveRecordedSong​(java.lang.String name, boolean isPublic)
      Notifies the controller that the recorded song must be saved
      Parameters:
      name - Song's name
      isPublic - Song's visibility (true = public, false = private)

    • muteSong

      void muteSong()
      Mute the octave INIT_OCTAVE to (INIT_OCTAVE + NUM_OCTAVES)

    • unmuteSong

      void unmuteSong()
      Unmute the octave INIT_OCTAVE to (INIT_OCTAVE + NUM_OCTAVES)

    • validateRecording

      void validateRecording()
      Tells the Controller the user has stopped recording the piano song, if the song is valid the Controller should notify the view thorough 'requestSongInformation()'.
